Valérie Gehlé

Fullstack web developer

About me

HELLO, MY NAME IS VALERIE. I am a fullstack web developer and an engineer. The first time I coded was in 2006 on Matlab, while I was in preparatory classes for engineer schools. Since then, programming has kept waving at me (statistics on R in engineer school, projects on VBA and SQL during internships).

After finishing Le Wagon FullStack bootcamp in 2019, I decided to push it further by following the Code&Go bootcamp at EPITECH.

I always work with a growth mindset which allows me to see difficulties as challenges, I am a fast learner, driven by great team work, emphatic and determined colleagues and the satisfaction you get after having spent energy on a clean and DRY code that works!

Projects

KRAKEN BLOG

KRAKEN BLOG is a web app allowing members to post short messages and follow other members.

CONTEXT: Project developed in a team of 2 as part of EPITECH Code & Go's bootcamp.

TECH: MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React JS, Node.js), Bootstrap, Git, GitHub, Trello

CATOYS is an online shop with toys for cats.

CONTEXT: Project realised by me as part of EPITECH Code & Go's bootcamp.

TECH: MongoDB, Express, Node.js, Bootstrap, Git, GitHub, Trello

Amnesia

Amnesia is a web app for people who want to create and share movie lists.

CONTEXT: Project developed in a team of 2 as part of EPITECH Code & Go's bootcamp.

TECH: PHP7, Symfony4, The Movie Database API, Bootstrap, Git, GitHub, Trello

Website displaying all the roller derby leagues in the world.

CONTEXT: Personal project developed on my own.

DERBY MATCH

DERBY MATCH is a website developed that helps roller derby teams to find other teams and plan games. Watch video presentation

CONTEXT: Project developed in a team of 4 as part of Le Wagon bootcamp.

TECH: Ruby on Rails, Webpack, PostGreSQL, Bootstrap, Git, GitHub, Cloudinary
